code: import React,{useMemo}from'react';import{ApiHubLayout}from'layer7-apihub';import{useSelector}from'react-redux';import{lightTheme,darkTheme}from'../theme';import{CustomAppBar}from'./CustomAppBar';export var CustomLayout=function CustomLayout(props){var themeMode=useSelector(function(state){return state.theme;});var theme=useMemo(function(){return themeMode==='dark'?darkTheme:lightTheme;},[themeMode]);return React.createElement(ApiHubLayout,Object.assign({appBar:CustomAppBar},props,{theme:theme}));};
